article_title: Must-see morning clip: Chipotle asks that you please not hunt and kill your burritos
article_text:
Topics: assault rifles, burritos, Chipotle, firearms, Gun Control, Guns, open carry, Video, Life News, Entertainment News

Over the weekend, a group of Open Carry members demonstrated their right to carry firearms into a Dallas Chipotle. Predictably, this made a lot of people uncomfortable. In response, Chipotle politely asked its customers to please not do that. If anyone is angry about Chipotle’s stance, Jon Stewart explains:

article_metadata.description: Jon Stewart explains why an open display of assault rifles might be unsettling to other customers VIDEO
